response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price. Given its value to you, we believe it's worth every penny. For this exceptional opportunity, I propose to sell the product to you for $14,000. This price not only ensures a fair deal for both of us but also leaves some room for negotiation if needed. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 14000}
